com.yworks.yfiles.view

Class ViewportAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.ViewportAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnimation

    public class ViewportAnimation
extends Object
implements IAnimation
    Animates changing the viewport bounds and the zoom factor for a CanvasControl.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewportAnimation(CanvasControl canvas, RectD targetBounds, Duration preferredDuration)
      Creates a new instance of ViewportAnimation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate(double time)
      Does the animation according to the relative animation time.
      protected void applyCenterPoint(PointD focus)
      Effectively applies the center point value.
      protected void applyViewPoint(PointD focus)
      Effectively applies the view point value.
      protected void applyZoom(double value)
      Effectively applies the zoom value.
      void cancel()
      Cancels this viewport animation so that subsequent calls to animate(double) or cleanup() won't affect the viewport anymore.
      void cleanup()
      Cleans up after the animation.
      double getMaximumTargetZoom()
      Gets the maximum zoom level to use after the animation.
      Duration getPreferredDuration()
      Gets the preferred duration of the animation.

      Gets the scroll bar visibility that will be used during the animation.

      Gets the margins in view coordinate dimensions to use at the target zoom level.

      Whether to respect the ViewportLimiter of the CanvasControl whose Viewport is animated.

      Sets the scroll bar visibility that will be used during the animation.

      • ViewportAnimation

        public ViewportAnimation(CanvasControl canvas,
                         RectD targetBounds,
                         Duration preferredDuration)
        Creates a new instance of ViewportAnimation.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas control.
        targetBounds - The target world bounds for the animation.
        preferredDuration - The preferred duration.

    • Method Detail

      • animate

        public void animate(double time)
        Description copied from interface: IAnimation
        Does the animation according to the relative animation time.

        The animation starts with the time 0 and ends with time 1.

        Specified by:
        animate in interface IAnimation
        Parameters:
        time - the animation time [0,1]

      • applyCenterPoint

        protected void applyCenterPoint(PointD focus)
        Effectively applies the center point value.

        protected void applyViewPoint(PointD focus)
        Effectively applies the view point value.

      • applyZoom

        protected void applyZoom(double value)
        Effectively applies the zoom value.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels this viewport animation so that subsequent calls to animate(double) or cleanup() won't affect the viewport anymore.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Cleans up after the animation.
        Specified by:
        cleanup in interface IAnimation

      • getMaximumTargetZoom

        public final double getMaximumTargetZoom()
        Gets the maximum zoom level to use after the animation.

        The default is Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY.

        Returns:
        The maximum target zoom.
        See Also:
        setMaximumTargetZoom(double)

      • getPreferredDuration

        public final Duration getPreferredDuration()
        Gets the preferred duration of the animation.
        Specified by:
        getPreferredDuration in interface IAnimation
        Returns:
        The PreferredDuration.
        See Also:
        setPreferredDuration(Duration)

      • getScrollBarVisibility

        public final ScrollPane.ScrollBarPolicy getScrollBarVisibility()
        Gets the scroll bar visibility that will be used during the animation.
        Returns:
        The scroll bar visibility to use during animation. The default is hidden.
        See Also:
        setScrollBarVisibility(ScrollPane.ScrollBarPolicy)

      • getTargetBounds

        public final RectD getTargetBounds()
        Gets the target world bounds.
        Returns:
        The TargetBounds.
        See Also:
        setTargetBounds(RectD)

      • getTargetViewMargins

        public final InsetsD getTargetViewMargins()
        Gets the margins in view coordinate dimensions to use at the target zoom level.
        Returns:
        The target view margins. The default is (0,0,0,0)
        See Also:
        setTargetViewMargins(InsetsD)

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes this animation.

        This has to be called once before any calls to animate(double). An instance of ViewportAnimation can be reused after an animation by setting new TargetBounds or a new PreferredDuration and calling Initialize() again.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface IAnimation

      • isViewportLimiterConsiderationEnabled

        public final boolean isViewportLimiterConsiderationEnabled()
        Whether to respect the ViewportLimiter of the CanvasControl whose Viewport is animated.

        Default is false.

        Returns:
        true if the ViewportLimiter should be considered, otherwise false.
        See Also:
        setViewportLimiterConsiderationEnabled(boolean)

      • setMaximumTargetZoom

        public final void setMaximumTargetZoom(double value)
        Sets the maximum zoom level to use after the animation.

        The default is Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY.

        Parameters:
        value - The maximum target zoom.
        See Also:
        getMaximumTargetZoom()

        public final void setViewportLimiterConsiderationEnabled(boolean value)
        Whether to respect the ViewportLimiter of the CanvasControl whose Viewport is animated.

        Default is false.

        Parameters:
